widget.text:
Parameters used in this ASM:
Transition Posture = Posture the getIn starts in and the getOut ends in used to distinguish between getIns/getOuts (standing/seated) and scoots (seated/seated)
Posture idle animation must be a very basic breathe loop
The second mirror state is needed in posture graphs to correctly determine boundary conditions
The get out animations have zero blend time. This was done to address an issue where the blanket would drop to bind pose if the interactions is cancelled while the game is paused (DT 48354)
